query: The recommended protein short names for UniProtKB entries
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?shortName
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:recommendedName ?recName .
  ?recName up:shortName ?shortName .
}
agent_answer: Retrieved recommended protein short names using two-hop property path through up:recommendedName to up:shortName.
expert_reason: Correct. Structurally identical to ground truth. Uses proper two-hop pattern.

query: List UniProtKB proteins with their associated named gene
agent_answer: Listed proteins with their associated genes using up:encodedBy property.
expert_reason: Correct. Structurally identical, uses proper type constraint and property.

query: List UniProtKB proteins with their associated gene and the gene's ORF label
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?gene ?orfName
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:encodedBy ?gene .
  ?gene up:orfName ?orfName .
}
agent_answer: Listed proteins with gene ORF names using up:encodedBy and up:orfName.
expert_reason: Correct. Extra ?protein projection is fine. Core pattern matches ground truth.

query: Retrieve the rank and the scientific name of an taxonomic record. Not all taxonomic records have a rank associated with them.
agent_answer: Retrieved taxonomic rank and scientific name with OPTIONAL for missing ranks.
expert_reason: Correct. Uses OPTIONAL for rank as required. Structurally matches ground truth.

query: Alternative protein full names for UniProtKB entries
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?fullName
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:alternativeName ?altName .
  ?altName up:fullName ?fullName .
}
agent_answer: Retrieved alternative protein full names via up:alternativeName -> up:fullName path.
expert_reason: Correct. Uses proper two-hop path through alternativeName.

query: List the created, last modified, and last sequence update dates for UniProtKB proteins.
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?created ?modified ?version
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:created ?created .
  ?protein up:modified ?modified .
  ?protein up:version ?version .
}
agent_answer: Listed protein date properties: up:created, up:modified, up:version.
expert_reason: Correct. All three date properties present with type constraint.

query: Predicates and objects, for a given UniParc accession as a subject
agent_answer: Retrieved all predicates and objects for the given UniParc accession.
expert_reason: Correct. Simple SPO pattern with bound subject. PREFIX not needed for full URI.

query: Retrieve UniProtKB entries with sequences that are composed of fragments
agent_answer: Retrieved protein entries with fragment sequences using MINUS pattern.
expert_reason: Correct. Uses MINUS pattern matching ground truth. Type constraint present.

query: Find the release number of the UniProt data that is currently being queried
agent_answer: Found the release version using pav:version predicate.
expert_reason: Missing FROM <https://sparql.uniprot.org/.well-known/void> clause. Queries default graph instead of void metadata graph. Named graph access required.

query: List all UniProtKB protein ID (mnemonic) for current UniProtKB entries.
agent_answer: Listed all protein mnemonics using up:mnemonic predicate.
expert_reason: Missing GRAPH <http://sparql.uniprot.org/uniprot> clause. Expected uses explicit named graph for current entries. Without it, may include obsolete entries.

query: List all UniProtKB protein ID (mnemonic) that where used in the past for current UniProtKB entries.
expert_reason: Missing GRAPH <http://sparql.uniprot.org/uniprot> clause. Expected uses explicit named graph for current entries.

query: List the proteins encoded by a gene that is located in an organelle other than the nucleus, or on a plasmid rather than a chromosome.
agent_answer: Listed proteins with their gene locations using up:encodedIn.
expert_reason: Incomplete projection: missing OPTIONAL rdfs:label for the location name. Expected returns protein, location, AND label. Also missing rdfs prefix.

query: Sometimes it is known that a gene encoding a protein UniProtKB is located on a plasmid or an organelle, but the name of the plasmid is unknown.
agent_answer: Found proteins encoded on plasmids or organelles.
expert_reason: Missing type constraint '?protein a up:Protein'. Also incomplete projection - should return location and optional label, not just protein.

query: Select all UniProtKB entries with annotated transmembrane regions and the regions' begin and end coordinates on the canonical sequence
expected_sparql:
PREFIX faldo: <http://biohackathon.org/resource/faldo#>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?begin ?end
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:annotation ?annotation .
  ?annotation a up:Transmembrane_Annotation .
  ?annotation up:range ?range .
  ?range faldo:begin/faldo:position ?begin .
  ?range faldo:end/faldo:position ?end
}
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?annotation
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:annotation ?annotation .
  ?annotation a up:Transmembrane_Annotation .
}
expert_reason: Incomplete: missing begin/end coordinates from faldo vocabulary. Task asks for coordinates but query only returns annotation URIs. Missing faldo:begin/faldo:position and faldo:end/faldo:position.

query: Select a mapping of UniProtKB to PDB entries using the UniProtKB cross-references to the PDB database
expected_sparql:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?db
WHERE {
    ?protein a up:Protein .
    ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?db .
    ?db up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/PDB>
}
agent_sparql:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?pdbRef
WHERE {
  ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?pdbRef .
  ?pdbRef up:database <http://purl.uniprot.org/database/PDB> .
}
agent_answer: Mapped UniProtKB entries to PDB using rdfs:seeAlso cross-references.
expert_reason: Missing type constraint '?protein a up:Protein'. Could match non-Protein entities with PDB cross-references.

query: List UniProtKB proteins with their associated gene and the gene's names that are used in the field, but not recommended for use by UniProtKB
agent_sparql:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?gene ?altName
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:encodedBy ?gene .
  ?gene rdfs:label ?altName .
}
agent_answer: Listed proteins with gene alternative names using rdfs:label.
expert_reason: Non-canonical pattern: uses rdfs:label instead of skos:altLabel. Ground truth uses SKOS vocabulary for alternative gene names. rdfs:label may return preferred names, not alternatives.

query: List UniProtKB proteins with their associated gene and the gene's preferred name
expert_reason: Wrong predicate: uses up:orfName instead of skos:prefLabel. ORF names are not preferred gene names. Also missing type constraint '?protein a up:Protein'.

query: Select reviewed UniProtKB entries (Swiss-Prot), and their recommended protein name, that have a preferred gene name that contains the text 'DNA'
expected_sparql:
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?name
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:reviewed true .
  ?protein up:recommendedName ?recommended .
  ?recommended up:fullName ?name .
  ?protein up:encodedBy ?gene .
  ?gene skos:prefLabel ?text .
  FILTER CONTAINS(?text, 'DNA')
}
agent_sparql:
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?protein ?name
WHERE {
  ?protein a up:Protein .
  ?protein up:recommendedName ?recName .
  ?recName up:fullName ?name .
  ?protein up:encodedBy ?gene .
  FILTER(CONTAINS(STR(?gene), 'DNA'))
}
agent_answer: Found proteins with gene names containing 'DNA'.
expert_reason: Missing 'up:reviewed true' filter - should only return Swiss-Prot (reviewed) entries. Also filters on gene URI string instead of skos:prefLabel text.

query: Find all taxonomic records that describe species of the genus Homo.
agent_sparql:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX taxon: <http://purl.uniprot.org/taxonomy/>
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>

SELECT ?species
WHERE {
  ?species rdfs:subClassOf taxon:9605 .
  ?species a up:Taxon .
}
agent_answer: Found species under genus Homo using subClassOf.
expert_reason: Missing rank constraints: should filter ?species to up:rank up:Species and ?genus to up:rank up:Genus. Also missing ?genus in projection. Returns all subclasses, not just species.
